root:
ECLIPSE org.eclipse.eclipse
SUBLIMETEXT2 com.sublimetext.2
SUBLIMETEXT3 com.sublimetext.3
ANDROIDSTUDIO com.google.android.studio
Escape to EISUU+Escape only some apps remap.jis_escape2eisuuAndEscape_Vim TERMINAL,SUBLIMETEXT2,ECLIPSE,ANDROIDSTUDIO,SUBLIMETEXT3 --KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::ESCAPE, KeyCode::JIS_EISUU, KeyCode::ESCAPE
#Vim Emulation
VIM_EMU_ONLY_APPS WORD
VIM_EMU_IGNORE_APPS
